2 hours ago

NEW YORK (AP) — Donald Trump claimed on Friday to have almost a half-billion dollars in cash but said he’d rather spend it on his presidential run than on the $454 million civil fraud judgment against him in New York. The former president vowed to fight the verdict “all the way up to the U.S. …
title: Biden and Trump’s post-Super Tuesday campaign schedules are a study in contrasts | Flipboard
author: CNN
